User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101203 Firefox/3.6.13
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101203 Firefox/3.6.13

Whenever I go to my email account and open a PPS that someone has sent me the system either locks or I get thrown back to the Desktop and then into the Mozilla again.
It keeps coming up with script not working do you want to continue or stop script.

Reproducible: Couldn't Reproduce




continued working as normal

comments.raw_text:
>Whenever I go to my email account
I assume you are using some kind of webmail because you reported this as Firefox Browser bug. which webmail do you mean ? Google webmail ?

>Mozilla3.0.1
What do you mean with Mozilla3.0.1 ?

>It keeps coming up with script not working do you want to continue or stop
script

Which script ?
The information is in the dialog
